amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the FEMA rescission of $389.2 million and enact a 0.33% reduction on all FY 2001 non- defense discretionary funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in part B of House Report 107-105 and made in order pursuant to H. Res. 171.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Toomey amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 65 - 362 (Roll no. 174).
